feature.name: camel-avro
feature.details: The camel-avro feature can only run if you have libsnappyjava.dylib in java.library.path

feature.name: camel-disruptor
feature.details: The camel-disruptor feature can only run on a SUN JVM. You need to add the package sun.misc to the java platform packages in the etc/jre.properties file.

feature.name: camel-hbase
feature.details: The camel-hbase feature can only run if you have libsnappyjava.dylib in java.library.path
Hadoop does not currently work properly in OSGi environment.

feature.name: camel-hdfs
feature.details: Hadoop does not currently work properly in OSGi environment.

feature.name: camel-hdfs2
feature.details: The camel-hdfs2 feature can only run if you have libsnappyjava.dylib in java.library.path

feature.name: camel-infinispan
feature.details: The camel-infinispan feature can only run on a SUN JVM. You need to add the package sun.misc to the java platform packages in the etc/jre.properties file.

feature.name: camel-jetty9
feature.details: camel-jetty9 intend to work with jetty9, so this feature only works in the karaf container which support jetty9, e.g. karaf 4.x

feature.name: camel-jibx
feature.details: this feature doesn't work under JDK8

feature.name: camel-optaplanner
feature.details: The camel-optaplanner feature can only run on a SUN JVM. You need to add the package com.sun.tools.xjc to the java platform packages in the etc/jre.properties file.

feature.name: camel-rx
feature.details: The camel-rx feature can only run on a SUN JVM. You need to add the package sun.misc to the java platform packages in the etc/jre.properties file.

feature.name: camel-servlet
feature.details: camel-servlet need to access the http OSGi services

feature.name: camel-servletlistener
feature.details: camel-servletlistener need to access the http OSGi services

feature.name: camel-spark-rest
feature.details: The camel-spark-rest feature requires Java 8 and Jetty9

feature.name: camel-spring-integration
feature.details: spring-integartion doesn't support importing spring 4.x

feature.name: camel-spring-redis
feature.details: spring-data-redis doesn't support importing spring version which is above 4.0.5

feature.name: camel-spring-security
feature.details: spring-security doesn't support importing spring 4.x

feature.name: camel-spring-ws
feature.details: spring-ws doesn't support importing spring 4.x

feature.name: camel-swagger
feature.details: camel-swagger need to access the http OSGi services

feature.name: camel-xmljson
feature.details: Before using this feature make sure to install this bundle first manually: mvn:xom/xom/1.2.5
